com.github.daytron.revworks.model

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.daytron.revworks.model.User
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Principal
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminUser, LecturerUser, StudentUser

    public abstract class User
extends Object
implements Principal
    The class to hold user information when login.
    Author:
    Ryan Gilera

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        public String getName()
        Access the unique identifier of a user. Principal class default implementation of this method refers to the username of a user to identify them uniquely but since there are two different usernames from two different user types, it is better to treat it as User ID as they are identified in the database.
        Specified by:
        getName in interface Principal
        Returns:
        A unique ID of the user
